title: PHL urged to monitor dirty money risks from online gambling, crypto
description: THE PHILIPPINES must keep an eye on money laundering risks arising from online gaming and cryptocurrency, even after it has exited the dirty money watchdog’s “gray list,” an analyst said. Choon Hong Chua, Moody’s head of financial crime practice group, Asia-Pacific and Middle East, said the Philippines’ removal from the Financial Action Task Force’s (FATF) […]
